articles.title: Hundreds of millions of COVID-19 vaccine doses available for 2021 - WHO - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: “If we’re very lucky, there will be one or two successful [vaccine] candidates before the end of this year,” said Soumya Swaminathan, WHO chief scientist.
